statements: SELECT * FROM quality_control_data;
SELECT product_name, defect_type, defect_timestamp FROM quality_control_data ORDER BY defect_timestamp DESC;
SELECT product_name, defect_type FROM quality_control_data WHERE defect_type = 'Crack';
SELECT id, defect_description FROM quality_control_data WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
SELECT * FROM quality_control_data WHERE defect_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY defect_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_data WHERE defect_type = 'crack' ORDER BY defect_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, defect_timestamp FROM quality_control_data WHERE defect_type = 'scratch' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS defect_count FROM quality_control_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM quality_control_data WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%' AND defect_description LIKE '%grain%';
SELECT product_name, defect_type, defect_timestamp FROM quality_control_data WHERE defect_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND defect_timestamp < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM defects WHERE defect_type = 'Scratch';
SELECT defect_id, defect_type FROM defects WHERE product_id = 1001;
SELECT defect_description FROM defects WHERE defect_type LIKE '%Crack%';
SELECT * FROM quality_control WHERE qc_result = TRUE ORDER BY qc_date DESC;
SELECT qc_id, product_id, qc_date FROM quality_control WHERE qc_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM defects WHERE product_id = 1 AND defect_type = 'Hardware';
SELECT defect_id, defect_description FROM defects WHERE defect_type LIKE '%Software%';
SELECT qc_id, qc_date FROM quality_control ORDER BY qc_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(defect_id) AS total_defects FROM defects GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_id, AVG(CAST(qc_result AS INT)) AS avg_qc_result FROM quality_control GROUP BY product_id HAVING AVG(CAST(qc_result AS INT)) > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, manufacturing_date FROM products
SELECT defect_description, defect_timestamp, defect_type FROM defects
SELECT defect_id, product_id, defect_type FROM defects WHERE defect_type = 'critical'
SELECT process_id, process_name, process_description FROM manufacturing_processes
SELECT * FROM defects WHERE defect_type = 'software' ORDER BY defect_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT defect_id, defect_description FROM defects WHERE product_id = 1001;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products JOIN defects ON products.product_id = defects.product_id;
SELECT defects.defect_id, products.product_name, defects.defect_description FROM defects JOIN products ON defects.product_id = products.product_id WHERE defects.defect_type = 'hardware';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE manufacturing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM defects;
SELECT defect_id, defect_type FROM defects WHERE defect_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT process_name, process_description, responsible_employee FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE process_id = 100;
SELECT tracking_id, tracking_date FROM defect_tracking WHERE product_id = 10 ORDER BY tracking_date DESC;
SELECT defect_id, defect_type, defect_date FROM defects WHERE defect_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category, manufacturing_date FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT process_name, process_description, responsible_employee FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE process_id > 3;
SELECT tracking_id, defect_id, product_id, process_id, tracking_date FROM defect_tracking WHERE tracking_id < 10;
SELECT defect_id, defect_type, product_id, defect_date FROM defects WHERE defect_type LIKE '%Software%';
SELECT defect_id, defect_type, defect_description FROM defects WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE manufacturing_location = 'Factory A';
SELECT defect_id, reported_by, report_date FROM defect_reports WHERE defect_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT defect_id, resolution_status FROM defect_tracking WHERE resolution_status = 'Resolved';
SELECT defect_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM quality_metrics WHERE defect_id < 20;
SELECT * FROM defects ORDER BY defect_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturing_date FROM products WHERE manufacturing_location='Factory A';
SELECT defect_type, defect_description FROM defects WHERE product_id = 3 AND defect_type = 'Hardware';
SELECT defect_id, product_id, defect_description FROM defects WHERE defect_description LIKE '%crack%';
SELECT defect_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM quality_metrics WHERE metric_value > 0.8 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
